title: The Car man: Pininfarina
subject_group: Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Automobiles - Design and construction
Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Automobile industry and trade
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Automobile industry and trade
description: Episode of Series "Pacemakers". Pininfarina, the world's greatest name in automobile design, founder of a firm which builds 25,000 car bodies a year, and designs many others. Farina has used his uncanny feeling for the look and shape of cars to build a unique industry - an industry which is ideally suited to a comparatively small industrial nation like Italy, and which has given her a reputation unequalled in the world. Commentary written and spoken by Anthony Jay.
